reviews.review: Melhor jogo da Valve. Sem mais, nem menos!
MUITO FODA, JOGABILIDADE FLUIDA, PUZZLES QUE TEM UM GRAU AS VEZES DESAFIADOR POREM NAO IMPOSSIVEL!
Самая интересная игра из серии Портал
One of the best puzzle games ever IMO
Es un juego muy entretenido y se nota da evolucion comparado con el anterior juego graficamente y en el gameplay
I've played this game for only an hour. Loved every minute of it. Definitely would recommend!
Fun Game With a Great Co-op Experince.
Still one of the best puzzle games ever made.
jogo bom de mais pela amor de deus viciante S2
No pare de jugar la campaña cooperativa con un amigo hasta terminarla xd fue muy divertido

Klasse Spiel, wie erwartet!
Tolle Rätsel wie in Portal mit einem gut struckturiertem und komunikativen multyplayer
extremamente divertido. Tanto solo quanto com amigos

атмосфера игры +
музыкальное сопровождение +
сюжет +
персонажи +
 
12/10
La historia es MUY superior a su antecesor. Técnicamente para ser un juego de 2011 es buenísimo.
The story, setting and immersive gameplay is just something I recommend for everyone to try.

Still great game and it will probably stay for next 5 years.
Graphic is usable and I would say avarage for 2019s games , if you aren't playing only AAA games with highest quality , you should find graphic avarege. And gameplay and story is great , there is no such game like this. And for that little price you should give it try if you didn't played it yet.
Co-Op doesn't work for some reason, but hey! It's a great time!
Quite nice and an enjoyable game

Incredible experience, a must-play for every gamer. Expands on the previous game in every way possible and adds a much longer campaign compared to that of the first game, which was much too short. In addition to the single player, you also have the co op campaign, which adds even more of that sweet content.
Portal 2 — это феномен, игра которая никого не оставит равнодушным, ярчайший пример того как надо делать игры. Её можно ставить вровень с лучшими играми современности, которых не так уж много.
i've spent most of my time in this game with the map maker.
Este juego es la ostia tia chaval onda vital kokum
Best puzzle game ever made. In Single Player and Coop too.
İlk oyununu beğendiyseniz bunu da alabilirsiniz. İlk oyunun hikayesinin devamı niteliğinde. İster tek oynayıp hikayeye devam edebilir, isterseniz de Co-Op şeklinde arkadaşınızla oynayabilirsiniz.

SWEDISH : Spelet är faktiskt väldigt nice :-) 
ENGLISH : The game is actually very nice :-)
FRANCE :  Le jeu est vraiment très sympa :-)
SPAIN   :  El juego es realmente muy bonito :-)
Jiddich : דער שפּיל איז פאקטיש זייער פייַן :-)
Fajna gierka ogólnie polecam sobie pograć

Großartiges Puzzlespiel, mit genialem co-op.
Hat Potential je nach Unfähigkeit der Spieler Stunden zu tilgen wie nichts.

Einziges Manko ist, das es keinen wirklichen wiederspielwert hat, da de Level wenn einmal geschafft, auch nach einem halben Jahr noch  einfach wieder zu erledigen sind, da die Struktur der Level doch sehr einfach ist, wenn man sie einmal kann.
Very Very good game, loved this game when I was young. As soon as it goes on sale, pic it up. Best puzzle game n/a. Play it with your friends! :D

An absolute classic that stands the test of time. Whether playing alone or with someone, this puzzle game provides an amazing experience. After running through the content Valve has made, there are so many community made maps that provide an incredible  amount of entertainment. Think with portals, believe in the cake, just buy this game if you haven't already played it.
A rly nice game with fun dialogue. I didnt like much the open areas where you are mostly trying to find where to place a portal rather than solving a puzzle but ok, its good i recomend.
achei top demais, joguei pra caralho
Fun with friends. difficult but fun
an amazing experience to enjoy both with friends and in your closet
good game lots of fun with singel player and co-op
Ну что сказать игра классная, сначала головоломки лёгкие а ближе к концу это пипец, стоит купить эту игру
A really fun game with a great story for both single player and co-op
Solo diré: Recomendadísimo, una joya de los juegos puzzles. 9/10
Very good game. I like how polished it is.
This game is one of a kind.
Super-Kreatives Knobel-Spiel macht auch heute noch alleine oder im Koop mega Laune!
Для всех мальчиков и девочек советую увлекательные приключения с картошкой по подземному комплексу
Fun game! I really enjoyed the story as it was surprising and funny too.

"Если в ходе теста нет угрозы жизни, разве это вообще наука?"
Играть в кооперативе самое то, да и одному тоже. 
Послушать такие фразы как  "Привет имбециииил." , "Ты не обычный дурак,ты спроектированный дурак." и так далее, то вас точно стоит поиграть.
Довольно интересные головоломки, хоть и не всегда понятно с первого раза как их проходить.
Так что точно советую)
great game for friends who want to mess around and screw the other one over alot

Extrem gutes Spiel! Gute Story. Gutes Gameplay. 
Was will man mehr?
11/10 would destroy an evil robot again.
